name: give-me-the-aux
description: Music voting app with React Native frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.dev:clean: docker compose down && docker compose up
scripts.prisma:studio: docker compose --profile tools run --rm -p 5555:5555 prisma studio --hostname 0.0.0.0
scripts.prisma:push: docker compose --profile tools run --rm prisma db push
scripts.prisma:generate: docker compose --profile tools run --rm prisma generate
scripts.prisma:reset: docker compose --profile tools run --rm prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:seed: docker compose --profile tools run --rm prisma db seed
